post:
<center>**XHOSTFIRE LLC
LIMITED OFFER: USE COUPON (LETSHARED) TO TAKE 55% OFF YEARLY PRICE**</center>

Our servers in Norway are 100% powered by renewable energy, mainly hydro and wind. The state of the art data center is LOS Energy + ISO certified with 2N UPS, natural cooling, fire and EM protection.

- Connectivity - Multiple redundant paths to the ISP. Cisco HSRP and LACP NIC bonding for resiliency. Network mitigation is also provided.

- Low latency and optimized network - Extensive fiber optic capacity through Denmark and rest of the Nordics. Peering with AMS-IX, DE-CIX, NL-IX, Equinix USA, LINX, NIX, Netnod.  [Network map](https://i.imgur.com/np8VcJI.jpg)

- Platform - Choose between PHP 5,6 or 7. Sites are based on Litespeed with LSCache. Data is stored on SSD drives + Intel E3v6. SSL is provided through Comodo cPanel's AutoSSL. You also get unmetered features such as DBs, domains, users etc.

<center>![](https://i.imgur.com/nCRLqmY.png)</center>

**StarterXG**

Storage: 2 GB
Bandwidth: 50 GB

Discounted price: $6.73/year (~0.56c/month)
Order Now- https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=23

<b>BasicXG</b>

Storage: 10 GB
Bandwidth: 100 GB

Discounted price: $8.98/year
Order Now - https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=10

<b>MediumXG</b>

Storage: 20 GB
Bandwidth: 150 GB

Discounted price: $13.50/year
Order Now - https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=11

*The customer is responsible for backups, unless other arrangements are made.
*Coupon only applies on an annual basis. 
*Terms: https://www.xhostfire.com/terms.php
